# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before starting operations.
- Ensure that burner inserters have fuel before starting operations.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before starting operations.

### Errors when entities are empty or have no ingredients
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before starting operations.
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before starting operations.
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before starting operations.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before starting operations.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No variables have been assigned.
